tasks: Review pertinent information, elaborate a strategy depending on the needs each group of 2-5 tutees shows and create educational materials to further demonstrate the subject matter to be covered in tutoring sessions.
Recognize the relationship between social-emotional learning and academic performance to contribute in the well-being, health, and safety, physically, socially, and emotionally of the tutee.

Design and facilitate differentiated and personalized learning goals and activities that follow a coherent sequence, are aligned to instructional goals, and engage tutees during high level cognitive activity.
